text: Savia Potellas ([[human]] councilor for [[Lower Menthis]]) owns a [[brothel|Savia's]] in [[Firelight]], and the conservative members of the [[Sharn Council]] were outraged by her appointment. She is extremely sharp at business, but she is currently caught in a bind. She has grown tired of paying tribute to the [[Boromar Clan]] and the [[Tyrants]] in order to run her business, but she is afraid to openly move against the powerful crime lords. She could become a valuable ally for adventurers that oppose the Boromars.
title: Savia Potellas
tooltip: Lower Menthis representative on the Sharn Council
